mapper.select: select member_id as no , name as name, email as email, tel as phoneNum, cdt as joinDate from lms_member order by name asc
select member_id as no, name as name, email as email, tel as phoneNum, cdt as joinDate from lms_member where member_id=#{ohoh}

select member_id as no , name , email , tel as phoneNum, cdt as joinDate from lms_member where name like concat('%', #{value}, '%') or email like concat('%', #{value}, '%') or tel like concat('%', #{value}, '%') order by name asc
select member_id as no , name as name, email as email, tel as phoneNum, cdt as joinDate from lms_member where email=#{email} and pwd=password(#{password})
